sentences.sentence: He ruled unsparingly. In his Libya, dissent was punishable by death.
sentences.translation: 他奉行铁血政策。卡扎菲在位期间，政见不同者以死刑处置。

sentences.sentence: You are Beings of unlimited Love and Light, and we simply ask that you use it unsparingly and equally to all souls regardless.
sentences.translation: 你们是无限爱与光的存有们，我们只简单的要求你们使用它，慷慨的，平等的对待所有的灵魂。

sentences.sentence: He called himself a cripple unsparingly in his autobiography, "Under the Eye of the Clock", which won the 1988 Whitbread Book of the Year.
sentences.translation: 他在获得1988•whitbread年度图书大奖的自传《钟眼之下》中，曾很不留情面地自嘲为“一名瘸子”。
